Summary: September 2024, a torrential storm struck Glastonbury, England. At Brodenhack Manor, where Maggie and Hector grew up, worry hangs in the air: their adoptive father is gravely ill. Both fear that his end has come. At the same time, just a few kilometres away, two explorers stumble upon an abandoned crypt filled with history and mysteries. Their visit will unleash an evil that will fall upon the town and its inhabitants, spreading fear among people for whom magic is nothing more than a myth. An evil that only a sorcerer like Merlin the Enchanter can defeat—provided he remembers who he is.
